Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Hexagonal \Hex*ag"o*nal\, a. [Cf. F. hexagonal.] Having six sides and six angles; six-sided. [1913 Webster]
{Hexagonal system}. (Crystal.) See under {Crystallization}. [1913 Webster]
hexagonal adj : having six sides or divided into hexagons [syn: {hexangular}]
